feed.title: HiveDAV Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Music Assistant: 2.0.1
entry.content:
Several bugfixes for the 2.0.0 release!

What’s Changed

  • 1291 - Fix default enqueue options (@marcelveldt)

  • 1290 - Fix phantom artists in library (@MarvinSchenkel)

  • 1289 - Fix the quality score (@marcelveldt)

Frontend

  • Lokalise: Translations update (@marcelveldt)
  • Fix back button in toolbar (@marcelveldt)
  • Fix issues with items listings (@marcelveldt)
  • Improve the out of the box experience a bit (@marcelveldt)

entry.title: New release for Music Assistant: 2.0.2
entry.content:
What’s Changed

  • 1294 - Fix for the frontend redirecting to settings incorrectly

  • 1293 - Fix mass user playlists (and queue items) limited to 50 items (@marcelveldt)
